attributes.action: Offer English schools in England to learn the Welsh language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well as we all know Welsh is a growing language in a country right next door to England, and that many English nationals take holidays and come to live in Cymru (Wales)  So it would be great if they had knowledge of what to say and to respect the Welsh language.  This way, hopefully, we wont lose the beautiful language of Welsh.
